title.rendered: “Unveiling IDF’s Strategic Battles: Conquering Terror in Khan Yunis & Northern Regions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Fighters from the 98th Division continue their fierce battle in Khan Yunis; simultaneously, in the northern region, fighters from the 5th Brigade’s combat team have located and destroyed a tunnel that served the terrorists in the area.

Commando Brigade fighters continue their fierce battle in Khan Yunis. Egoz Unit fighters identified a group of terrorists armed with RPGs and eliminated them. Maglan Unit fighters eliminated several terrorists and found weapons in the area.

Paratroopers Brigade’s combat team soldiers continue to attack terror targets in Khan Yunis. The fighters eliminated terrorists and found numerous weapons.

In coordination with the 7th Brigade’s fire system, the Air Force eliminated two terrorists in the city using a fighter jet.

In the northern region, fighters from the 5th Brigade’s combat team found a tunnel and destroyed it. Additionally, the fighters eliminated terrorists and found weapons in the area.

In the central region, the Nahal Brigade’s combat team’s fire system targeted a remotely piloted aircraft that eliminated a terrorist nearby. Throughout the day, the combat team’s fighters eliminated additional terrorists.

Attached is footage from the attacks in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/47X0EUS

Attached are photos from the forces’ activity in the Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC2801202496854

Attached is a photo of the weapons found by Paratroopers Brigade fighters in Khan Yunis: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC28012024039848746
